articles.title: Disney Shutting Down 18 Cable Channels In Southeast Asia And Hong Kong From 1 October 2021 - Geek Culture
articles.description: Disney recently announced that its shutting down 18 of its cable tv channels to focus on a direct-to-consumer streaming model. Here's what we know so far.
articles.content:
Disney is closing 18 channels in Southeast Asia and Hong Kong starting 1 October 2021. This marks the end of an era for the company who has a huge entertainment supply chain in the region.

articles.description: Chloe Zhao on Sunday became the first Asian woman and only second woman ever to win the best director in the Oscars' 93-year history.
